title: Stock Futures Edge Down as Oil Prices Rise
sub_head: Brent crude prices climbed in early trading Wednesday, reversing recent losses
body:
U.S. stock futures fell and oil prices climbed, as concerns about the war in Ukraine and rising commodity prices continued to weigh on investors.
Futures for the S&P 500 slipped 0.4% Wednesday, while contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 lost 0.5%. Dow Jones Industrial Average futures slid 0.3%. On Tuesday, major U.S. stock indexes jumped, pushing the benchmark S&P 500 out of correction territory and extending its winning streak to four sessions.
